description: This file provides a lightweight AI client function to generate a Statement of Work (SOW) content from a prompt by calling a local backend API. It exports a single asynchronous function `generateSOWFromPrompt` that handles request construction, response parsing, and error handling.

methods.name: generateSOWFromPrompt(promptText)
methods.description: Asynchronously generates a SOW draft based on the provided prompt by calling the backend API specified at `/api/ai/sow`. Handles input validation, URL construction based on environment variables, response processing, and error handling.
